mapper.sql: t_adv.ID, t_adv.FCreateTime, t_adv.FCreateUserId, t_adv.FUpdateTime, t_adv.FUpdateUserId, t_adv.FGUID, t_adv.FChecked, t_adv.FDeleted, t_adv.FFreezed, t_adv.FAdvClassId, t_adv.FType, t_adv.FDefinition, t_adv.FBranchId, t_adv.FContractId, t_adv.FPositionId, b.FName temp, u.FName queryKeyWork
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_adv LEFT JOIN t_branch b ON b.id = t_adv.FBranchid LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = t_adv.FCreateUserId
order by t_adv.ID DESC
limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_adv (FCreateTime, FCreateUserId, FAdvClassId, FType, FDefinition, FBranchId, FPositionId) values
